U-BOOT UPDATE

You are going to update the U-Boot bootloader on the device.
Please choose a file from your local hard drive and click the Update U-Boot button.

WARNINGS
  • Do not power off the device during the update.
  • If everything goes well, the device will restart automatically.
  • You can upload any file, so ensure you choose the proper U-Boot image for your device.
  • Updating U-Boot is a very dangerous operation and may damage your device!
Version: 24.05.19
